title: Mr. I

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Piercing Gaze**: Stare right into someone's soul, learn who they visited every single night, including this one.
- **All-seeing**: Learn who visited a player every single night, including this one.
- **Peer into**: During the day, Instantly ask the host a yes or no question about the game, they will answer truthfully. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Piercing Gaze** and **All-Seeing** have a 1 night cooldown.
- **Peer Into** can be used multiple times in a single day.

desc:
Post 4376
*"It's an eye. A big, juicy, unblinking ever-watching eye. ...Gross."*
